Line 105: Line 105:
There are tools available to help making the decision, such as several different versions of the Linux Distribution Chooser<ref>[http://www.zegeniestudios.net/ldc/ zegenie Studios Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.tuxs.org/chooser/ (:^tuxs.org) Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://desktoplinuxathome.com/distro.html Desktop Linux At Home - Distro Selector<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and the universal package search tool, whohas.<ref>[http://www.philippwesche.org/2004/programs/whohas/intro.html Philipp's Homepage: whohas<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> There are some easy ways to try out several Linux distributions before deciding on one. [[Multi Distro]] is a [[Live CD]] that contains nine space-saving distributions.<ref>[http://www.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/05/22/1353239 Linux.com :: Multi Distro is Linux times 9 on a single CD-R<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Tools are available to make such CDs and DVDs, among them Nautopia.<ref>[http://applications.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/03/16/1724219&tid=47 Linux.com :: Multiple live CDs in one DVD<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
There are tools available to help making the decision, such as several different versions of the Linux Distribution Chooser<ref>[http://www.zegeniestudios.net/ldc/ zegenie Studios Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://www.tuxs.org/chooser/ (:^tuxs.org) Linux Distribution Chooser<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://desktoplinuxathome.com/distro.html Desktop Linux At Home - Distro Selector<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and the universal package search tool, whohas.<ref>[http://www.philippwesche.org/2004/programs/whohas/intro.html Philipp's Homepage: whohas<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> There are some easy ways to try out several Linux distributions before deciding on one. [[Multi Distro]] is a [[Live CD]] that contains nine space-saving distributions.<ref>[http://www.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/05/22/1353239 Linux.com :: Multi Distro is Linux times 9 on a single CD-R<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> Tools are available to make such CDs and DVDs, among them Nautopia.<ref>[http://applications.linux.com/article.pl?sid=06/03/16/1724219&tid=47 Linux.com :: Multiple live CDs in one DVD<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
â
Virtual machines such as [[QEMU]], [[VirtualBox]] and [[VMware]] permit booting of LiveCD image files without actually burning a CD. In the case of VMware, this requires a specific virtual machine to be downloaded.<ref>[http://www.vmwarez.com/2006/02/livecd-player-virtual-machine.html vmwarez.com: LiveCD Player Virtual Machine<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref><ref>[http://homepage.sunrise.ch/mysunrise/ekeller00/EricKellerUbuntuPage.html Emulating Ubuntu in Windows XP using the free VMware Player]</ref> In QEMU and VirtualBox, the functionality is already included.
+
Virtual machines such as [[QEMU]], [[VirtualBox]] and [[VMware]] permit booting of LiveCD image files without actually burning a CD.
Details and interest rankings of Linux distributions are available on [[DistroWatch]] and a fairly comprehensive list of Live CDs is [http://www.livecdlist.com/ The LiveCD List]. Some websites such as [http://shots.osdir.com/ OSDir.com] and [http://www.osvids.com/ OSVids.com] offer screenshots and videos as a means to getting a first impression of various distributions.
Details and interest rankings of Linux distributions are available on [[DistroWatch]] and a fairly comprehensive list of Live CDs is [http://www.livecdlist.com/ The LiveCD List]. Some websites such as [http://shots.osdir.com/ OSDir.com] and [http://www.osvids.com/ OSVids.com] offer screenshots and videos as a means to getting a first impression of various distributions.
